headline: Intel Is Seeking an Investment From Apple as Part of Its Comeback Bid

headline: Fmr. OpenAI Exec: Competitive Landscape Moving Quickly
summary: Microsoft Corp. will start using artificial intelligence models from Anthropic to help power its workplace AI assistant, adding a significant partner to a product that has so far been predominantly driven by OpenAI. This comes as Nvidia gets set to invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to help the ChatGPT maker support a massive build-out of data centers equipped with Nvidia's chips. Former OpenAI Global Affairs Head of Strategic Partnerships Lane Dilg joined Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec on 'Bloomberg Businessweek Live' at the Bloomberg Philanthropies Global Forum to discuss global artificial intelligence competition.

raw.headline: Fmr. OpenAI Exec: Competitive Landscape Moving Quickly
raw.summary: Microsoft Corp. will start using artificial intelligence models from Anthropic to help power its workplace AI assistant, adding a significant partner to a product that has so far been predominantly driven by OpenAI. This comes as Nvidia gets set to invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to help the ChatGPT maker support a massive build-out of data centers equipped with Nvidia's chips. Former OpenAI Global Affairs Head of Strategic Partnerships Lane Dilg joined Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec on 'Bloomberg Businessweek Live' at the Bloomberg Philanthropies Global Forum to discuss global artificial intelligence competition.

headline: Lorentz Solution Jointly Presents with NVIDIA on Large-Scale 3D Terahertz EM Simulation for Real IC/3DIC Silicon Case Studies in Photonic Switches at 2025 TSMC OIP
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., September 24, 2025--Lorentz Solution, Inc., the world’s leading provider on 3D electromagnetic (EM) design platform of IC, 3DIC, and advanced packaging, today announced that it is jointly presenting with NVIDIA at the TSMC 2025 Open Innovation Platform. Their paper, "Large-Scale 3D Terahertz EM Design and Signoff for 3DIC-Based Silicon Photonics with Silicon Case Studies", marks their second year jointly presenting cutting-edge photonic designs powered by PeakView®’s TeraHz

summary: On September 10, Desay SV announced during the International Motor Show Germany (IAA Mobility 2025) that it is expanding its intelligent driving solutions to overseas markets.
